# printPageRenderer

**Instance Property**

Returns the page renderer for the print formatter.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var printPageRenderer: UIPrintPageRenderer? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the receiving print formatter was not added to a page renderer—that is, it was assigned to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionController/printFormatter] property of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionController] class—the value returned is `nil`.

## Communicating with the page renderer

- **removeFromPrintPageRenderer()**: Removes the print formatter from the page renderer.
